recipe.title: Ginger Syrup
ingredients: 1/4 pound ginger, peeled and thinly sliced (about 3/4 cup)
instructions: Bring ginger, sugar, and water to a simmer in a small heavy saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring until sugar has dissolved, then gently simmer, uncovered, 30 minutes. Strain through a sieve and reserve ginger for another use (see cooks' note, below), then cool to room temperature.
